author: Stereogum
title: Q&A: Pile’s Rick Maguire On Taking Space From Boston And The Band’s New Album A Hairshirt Of Purpose
text: Rick Maguire -- otherwise known as “Rick From Pile” -- has been spending a lot of time on his own. When I called the 31-year-old frontman last month, he answered from a cabin in Ellijay, GA, where he’s been living in the woods at the foot of the Appalachian trail. Maguire’s been holed up there … More »
